# llms.txt â€” Guidance for Large Language Model and data crawlers
# Version: 1.1
# Generated: 2025-09-16

Site: qado.ai
Owner: qado
Contact: support@qado.ai
Homepage: https://qado.ai/
Sitemaps: https://qado.ai/sitemap.xml
Canonical-Source: https://qado.ai/
Languages: en, de

# General access policy
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Large or binary assets generally not useful for text ingestion
Disallow: /assets/*.mp4
Disallow: /assets/*.zip
Disallow: /assets/*.pdf

# Crawl hygiene
Crawl-Delay: 2
Respect: robots.txt
Use-Canonical: true

# Preferred attribution
Preferred-Attribution: "qado (qado.ai)"
Preferred-Attribution-URL: https://qado.ai/

# Data usage guidance
Content-Usage-Allowed: indexing, short snippet extraction (<160 chars), summarization, citation with link
Content-Usage-Not-Allowed: full-text republication, training proprietary models without prior written permission
License: All rights reserved. For broader use, contact support@qado.ai

# Update cadence
Update-Frequency: weekly

# Current site pages (public HTML files)
Page: /
Page: /about.html
Page: /contact.html
Page: /faq.html
Page: /login.html
Page: /impressum.html
Page: /datenschutz.html
Page: /google872ac9a8d2ac9076.html

# Notes
# - Binary image assets under /assets/ are excluded from text ingestion rules above.
# - For any dataset or model training requests, contact support@qado.ai for licensing.
